title: Average age of players in Major League Baseball by club 2019
summary: This is a bar chart representing Major League Baseball Player in the x axis and Average player age in years in the y axis.
The Average player age in years is highest at Major League Baseball Player Washington Nationals and lowest at Major League Baseball Player Baltimore Orioles.
The highest value at Major League Baseball Player Washington Nationals is 1.17x times more than the lowest value at Baltimore Orioles.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Major League Baseball Player in the x axis and Average player age in years in the y axis.
The Average player age in years is highest at Major League Baseball Player Washington Nationals and lowest at Major League Baseball Player Baltimore Orioles.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Major League Baseball Player in the x axis and Average player age in years in the y axis.
The Average player age in years is highest at Major League Baseball Player Washington Nationals and lowest at Major League Baseball Player Baltimore Orioles.
The highest value at Major League Baseball Player Washington Nationals is 1.17x times more than the lowest value at Baltimore Orioles.
max_summary: This bar chart has 30 columns on the x axis representing Major League Baseball Player, and Average player age in years in each Major League Baseball Player on the y axis.
The Average player age in years is highest at Major League Baseball Player Washington Nationals and lowest at Major League Baseball Player Baltimore Orioles.
The lowest value at Major League Baseball Player Baltimore Orioles is 1.17x times less than the highest value at Washington Nationals.
Average player age in years at Major League Baseball Player Washington Nationals is 30.1 , second place is Oakland Athletics at 29.9, and thirdly is Houston Astros at 29.8.
Similar Average player age in years is found in Major League Baseball Player Chicago Cubs, Atlanta Braves, and New York Yankees.
The lowest value 25.7 at Baltimore Orioles is almost 1.07 times smaller than the average value 28.1.
The Average player age in years is 843.0 if we add up values of all Major League Baseball Players.
